nodes.text: The Elgit–M'Hanna Corridor was a hyperlane that connected the planets Elgit, Sakifwanna and M'Hanna.

The Elgit–M'Hanna Corridor was first depicted in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, and was first named in Lords of Nal Hutta, a 2015 sourcebook for the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game, published by Fantasy Flight Games.
